products.name: Professional Chef Knife 8-inch
products.description: High-carbon stainless steel blade with ergonomic handle. Perfect for chopping, dicing, and slicing vegetables, meat, and fish.

products.name: Paring Knife 3.5-inch
products.description: Precision paring knife for detailed work. Sharp, lightweight, and comfortable grip for peeling and intricate cuts.

products.name: Bread Knife Serrated 10-inch
products.description: Serrated blade designed for clean cuts through crusty bread without crushing. Also great for tomatoes and delicate items.

products.name: Santoku Knife 7-inch
products.description: Japanese-style Santoku knife with hollow edge. Excellent for vegetables, fish, and meat with precise, clean cuts.

products.name: Utility Knife 5-inch
products.description: Versatile utility knife perfect for medium-sized tasks. Ideal for slicing sandwiches, small fruits, and general prep work.

products.name: Steak Knife Set (4-piece)
products.description: Set of 4 sharp steak knives with comfortable handles. Perfect for dinner parties and cutting cooked meats.

products.name: Carving Knife 10-inch
products.description: Long, thin blade perfect for carving roasts, turkey, and large cuts of meat. Essential for holiday cooking.

products.name: Cleaver 7-inch
products.description: Heavy-duty cleaver for chopping through bones and tough cuts. Professional-grade tool for serious cooks.

products.name: Wooden Spoon Set (3-piece)
products.description: Handcrafted wooden spoons from sustainable beech wood. Safe for non-stick cookware and perfect for stirring.

products.name: Stainless Steel Serving Spoon
products.description: Large serving spoon perfect for buffets and family dinners. Durable stainless steel construction.

products.name: Slotted Spoon
products.description: Perforated spoon for draining liquids while serving. Essential for pasta, vegetables, and fried foods.

products.name: Soup Ladle
products.description: Deep bowl ladle perfect for serving soups, stews, and sauces. Comfortable grip and precise pouring.

products.name: Measuring Spoons Set
products.description: Stainless steel measuring spoons with clear markings. Includes 6 essential sizes for precise cooking.

products.name: Silicone Mixing Spoon
products.description: Heat-resistant silicone spoon perfect for mixing hot foods. Won't scratch non-stick surfaces.

products.name: Serving Fork Large
products.description: Large serving fork for meat, salads, and buffet service. Matches serving spoons for complete set.

products.name: Carving Fork
products.description: Two-pronged carving fork to hold meat steady while slicing. Essential companion to carving knife.

products.name: Pasta Fork
products.description: Specialized fork with curved tines for serving pasta. Helps grab and serve long noodles easily.

products.name: Salad Serving Fork
products.description: Wide-tined fork perfect for tossing and serving salads. Gentle on delicate greens.

products.name: Bamboo Cutting Board Large
products.description: Eco-friendly bamboo cutting board. Naturally antimicrobial and knife-friendly surface for all prep work.

products.name: Walnut Wood Cutting Board
products.description: Premium walnut cutting board with beautiful grain. Perfect for serving cheese and charcuterie.

products.name: Plastic Cutting Board Set
products.description: Color-coded plastic cutting boards to prevent cross-contamination. Dishwasher safe and lightweight.

products.name: Glass Cutting Board
products.description: Tempered glass cutting board with non-slip feet. Easy to clean and hygienic for all food prep.

products.name: Marble Cutting Board
products.description: Natural marble cutting board, perfect for pastry work and keeping dough cool. Elegant serving piece.

products.name: Acacia Wood Cutting Board
products.description: Durable acacia wood cutting board with juice groove. Perfect for carving meats and general prep.

products.name: Silicone Spatula Set
products.description: Heat-resistant silicone spatulas in multiple sizes. Non-stick friendly and dishwasher safe.

products.name: Stainless Steel Tongs
products.description: Professional-grade tongs with locking mechanism. Perfect for grilling, serving, and cooking.

products.name: Vegetable Peeler
products.description: Sharp, comfortable vegetable peeler with ergonomic handle. Essential for prep work.

products.name: Box Grater 4-Sided
products.description: Four-sided box grater with different grating sizes. Perfect for cheese, vegetables, and citrus zest.

products.name: Wire Whisk Set
products.description: Set of 3 wire whisks in different sizes. Essential for beating eggs, whipping cream, and mixing batters.

products.name: Can Opener Manual
products.description: Heavy-duty manual can opener with comfortable grip. Reliable and easy to use for all can sizes.

products.name: Kitchen Timer Digital
products.description: Digital kitchen timer with magnetic back and loud alarm. Perfect for timing multiple dishes.

products.name: Garlic Press
products.description: Heavy-duty garlic press that crushes garlic without peeling. Easy to clean and dishwasher safe.

products.name: Kitchen Shears
products.description: Multi-purpose kitchen scissors with comfortable grip. Great for herbs, packaging, and food prep.

products.name: Meat Thermometer Digital
products.description: Instant-read digital thermometer for perfect cooking temperatures. Essential for food safety.

products.name: Silicone Basting Brush
products.description: Heat-resistant silicone brush for basting and glazing. Easy to clean and won't shed bristles.
